acceptance-test-run.title: Filter flights by city before booking
acceptance-test-run.name: Filter flights by city before booking

tag.name: Book a flight on the Flying High site

test-group.name: Given I want to book a flight

test-step.description: When I enter 'Se' into the 'from' city field
Then I should see the following cities: {Seattle, Seoul}
